description: In a world of competition, it's rare to find a product that so perfectly compliments another as theSmart Sleevedoes with the iPad Air Smart Cover.Operating in perfect synergy, theSmart Sleeveis a form fitting Thermoplastic Polyurethane (TPU) cover that fills in the blanks the Apple Smart Cover leaves behind. Simply slip the corners of your iPad Air into the sleeve to discover a perfect fitting back cover that still allows for full movement, opening, and closure of your existing Smart Cover.You will love the no-slip matte finish and cutouts that allow for easy access to your iPad Air's camera, controls, and ports. And with serval vibrant colors to choose from, theSmart Sleevegrants you permission to broadcast your love for all things pink and scratch resistant.Thermoplastic Polyurethane (TPU), one of the industry's gold standard materials, is known for its:<ul><li>Strong resistance to oil, grease, and fingerprints</li><li>Excellent abrasion resistance</li><li>High strength and elasticity</li></ul>
title: BoxWave Apple iPad Air Smart Sleeve - Slim Fit, Apple Smart Cover Compatible iPad Air TPU Back Case for iPad Air, Front Apple Smart Cover Not Included - LIFETIME WARRANTY - (Jet Black)
